description: During his first mission as leader of the 08th MS Team, Shiro manages to become lost in the jungles of Southeast Asia. As he wanders aimlessly, Shiro comes across a young woman named Kiki, who turns out to be the daughter of a local guerilla leader. Though Shiro and Kiki`s initial encounter goes badly, she and her comrades eventually grow to trust the young Federation officer, and become valuable allies of the 08th MS Team.
name: Kiki Rosita
